import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent { isMobileNavVisible: boolean = false; isCompact: boolean = false; dropdowns = [ { label: 'Media', icon: 'fas fa-photo-video', isOpen: false, items: ['All', 'Recent', 'Images', 'Video'], }, { label: 'Users', icon: 'fas fa-users', isOpen: false, items: ['All', 'Subscribed', 'Non-subscribed', 'Banned', 'New'], }, { label: 'Payments', icon: 'fas fa-money-check-alt', isOpen: false, items: ['All', 'Recent', 'Projections'], }, ]; toggleDropdown(dropdown: any): void { // Close all other dropdowns this.dropdowns.forEach((d) => { if (d !== dropdown) { d.isOpen = false; } }); // Toggle the clicked dropdown dropdown.isOpen = !dropdown.isOpen; } toggleMenu(): void { const isMobile = window.matchMedia('(max-width: 990px)').matches; if (isMobile) { this.isMobileNavVisible = !this.isMobileNavVisible; } else { this.isCompact = !this.isCompact; } } }
